Replace.Text: From mind reading
From mind reading
Mind Reading
By reading your mind, you have learned
Performing Arts Club
Performing Arts Club

A unique college building in Fengyinxiang civilization. Unlocks writing, does not replace the library, adds 2 culture points, 5 gold points, 1 habitability point, and a writing slot. Provides 1 great writer point, costing 75% of the library
Fenghua High School
Fenghua High School

A special area of ​​Fengyin Township civilization. Unlocked by writing, it replaces the college area. It adds 1 technology point for each ocean or forest cell near the original college area. The cost is 75% of the original college area.

A special area of ​​Fengyin Township civilization. Unlocked by writing, it replaces the college area. It adds 1 technology point for each ocean or forest cell near the original college area. The cost is 75% of the original college area.
Yihai Hengyin Orphanage

Leader Tang Haiyin's featured area, astrology unlocked, replaces the Holy Land, adds 1 more habitability point on the basis of the original Holy Land, and adds 1 more faith value adjacent bonus for each ocean cell close to it. The cost is 75% of the original Holy Land
Yihai Hengyin Orphanage

Leader Tang Haiyin's featured area, astrology unlocked, replaces the Holy Land, adds 1 more habitability and 1 more faith value adjacency bonus for each ocean cell, and the cost is 75% of the original Holy Land
Secret base in the maple forest
Special improvements for leaders Yao Fengyi and Yao Fengqian: Irrigation technology unlocked, adding 1 more literature, 1 more science, and 1 more case to the improved plots
Secret base in the maple forest
Special improvements for leaders Yao Fengyi and Yao Fengqian: Irrigation technology unlocked, adding 1 more literature, 1 more science, and 1 more case to the improved plots
Tang Haiyin
The Mermaid Princess of the Moon and the Sea

With full intelligence, the effect of foreign spies in the country is reduced by 2 levels, and 3 combat power is added when fighting, and an additional 10 strength is added when fighting against barbarians.
The Mermaid Princess of the Moon and the Sea

With full intelligence, the effect of foreign spies in the country is reduced by 2 levels, and 3 combat power is added when fighting, and an additional 10 strength is added when fighting against barbarians.
The forgotten Dragon King of the sea has turned into a mortal girl. The blue ocean still obeys your orders. Now the time has come to find your true love.
Yao Fengyi
Maple Girl

All cities will have 1 point of habitability and 6 points of loyalty added, the number of trade routes will be increased by 1, and when your own units defeat enemy units, they will recover 25 points of health. The domestic charm value will be an additional 1 point of culture value for the amazing level cell, and 1 point of food bonus.
Maple Girl

All cities will have 1 point of habitability and 6 points of loyalty added, the number of trade routes will be increased by 1, and when your own units defeat enemy units, they will recover 25 points of health. The domestic charm value will be an additional 1 point of culture value for the amazing level cell, and 1 point of food bonus.

The legend of the wandering girl is still being sung in Maple Sound Township. The tradition of the title of Maple Flower Girl is the inheritance of the legend. Among the mountains of red maples, the two who hear the sound of maple leaves will surely meet again.
Yao Fengqian
The back of a maple leaf

The number of trade routes increases by 5, there is no war-weariness in the country, after sending the first envoy to the city-state, two more envoys will be sent, and other civilizations cannot launch surprise wars against you
The back of a maple leaf

The number of trade routes increases by 5, there is no war-weariness in the country, after sending the first envoy to the city-state, two more envoys will be sent, and other civilizations cannot launch surprise wars against you
On the back of the fiery red maple leaf, the girl who grew up under the shadow of her sister will experience her greatest test. You will definitely grow up to be independent and find your true love.
Fengyin Township
Fengyin Township
The legend of the maple sea

Give 3 points of charm to the cells within your territory. If the charm level of your cell is amazing, the cell will provide an additional 2 points of culture, 2 points of faith, 1 point of gold, 1 point of productivity, and 1 point of food.
The legend of the maple sea

Give 3 points of charm to the cells within your territory. If the charm level of your cell is amazing, the cell will provide an additional 2 points of culture, 2 points of faith, 1 point of gold, 1 point of productivity, and 1 point of food.
Members of Fenghua Interest Club
Members of Fenghua Interest Club

A unique unit of Fengyinxiang civilization. Apprentice technology unlocks, replaces armored warriors, costs 150 points of productivity to train, 1 gold coin to maintain, 4 points of movement, 50 strength

A unique unit of Fengyinxiang civilization. Apprentice technology unlocks, replaces armored warriors, costs 150 points of productivity to train, 1 gold coin to maintain, 4 points of movement, 50 strength
Tang Haiyin

Leader Tang Haiyin's unique unit, appears at the beginning of the game, has an independent promotion tree and bonuses obtained with technology, basic movement is 3, basic melee is 30 strength, ranged is 25 strength, range is 2
Tang Haiyin

Leader Tang Haiyin's unique unit, appears at the beginning of the game, has an independent promotion tree and bonuses obtained with technology, basic movement is 3, basic melee is 25 strength, ranged is 25 strength, range is 2
Mermaid of the Moon Sea
It has an independent promotion tree and bonuses obtained with technology. The basic movement is 3, the basic melee is 25 strength, the range is 25 strength, and the range is 2
Yao Fengyi
Leader Yao Fengyi's unique unit, appears at the beginning of the game, has a movement of 5, can increase the movement of allied units within 4 circles by 3, and has a fixed bonus of forced recovery
Yao Fengyi
Leader Yao Fengyi's unique unit, appears at the beginning of the game, has a movement of 5, can increase the movement of allied units within 4 circles by 3, and has a fixed bonus of forced recovery
Yao Fengyi's Halo
Brings an aura bonus of 5 strength, 2 movement, and forced recovery to allied units within 4 rings.
Yao Fengqian

Leader Yao Fengqian's unique unit, appears at the beginning of the game, has a movement of 5, can increase the movement of units within 10 rings around it by 2 points, and increases the habitability of cities by 3 points
Yao Fengqian
Leader Yao Fengqian's unique unit, appears at the beginning of the game, has a movement of 5, and can provide 2 movement points and 3 habitability bonuses to units within 10 rings around it
Yao Fengqian's Halo
2 points of mobility for units within 10 rings and 3 points of habitability for cities
The Mermaid Princess of the Moon and the Sea
I don't like civilizations that build cities by the sea, I like civilizations that don't build cities by the sea
Maple Girl
I like civilizations that don't fight, and I hate civilizations that fight frequently.
Maple Girl
Likes civilizations that are not tied to cities, dislikes civilizations that are tied to cities
Ancient legend

The field of vision is not hindered by terrain, combat effectiveness is not lost when injured, health is automatically restored each round, and the unit gains 6 strength and 5 more strength when fighting.
Xihai Old Friend

Movement is not penalized by terrain, and landing operations across a river do not reduce movement. Movement is increased by 1, and the entire city adds 1 science and 1 culture. Invisible units can be detected.
The Promise of Millions of Shells
Add 1 livability to the entire city, and 10 basic strength to each unit
Lightness of life
The whole city's livability is reduced by 1 point, and the range is increased by 2. Units gain 3 more strength when fighting, and units become invisible.
Moon Sea Sound
Unlock all sea areas for the unit in advance, add 15 strength and 1 movement when attacking sea units.
Maple Night
The livability of the entire city is reduced by 2 points, but the gold of Koven pigeons is increased by 10%, and the units' strength and range are increased by 10 and 1 respectively during combat.
Orange fragrance difference
The unit's field of vision increases by 3 rings, and its strength increases by 5 and its movement by 1 in combat.
The Final Trial

When the unit is in combat, its strength is increased by 10, its range is increased by 1, its field of vision is increased by one ring, its mobility is increased by 2, and its productivity is increased by 10%.
Yihai Hengyin
Increase the city's livability by 3, housing by 5, and total faith output by 10%
The Mermaid Princess of the Moon and the Sea

Increases the livability of the entire city by 1, increases the combat strength of units by 15, increases the air defense strength of units by 100, increases the range by 1, and increases the charm of domestic cells by 5
Sister Gui Hai's Black-Hearted Clothing Store

Forest tiles provide adjacent technology bonuses
Coastal tiles provide a bonus to adjacent faiths
Rainforest tiles provide adjacent technology bonuses
Coastal tiles provide adjacent technology bonuses
Very good, that's it
(Feng Qian appreciates your behavior)
It's a joke. You are really hopeless.
(Feng Qian is dissatisfied with your behavior)
You see, this is possible, isn't it?
Can you help Fengyi disperse the clouds in the sky?
Very good, never betray my sister
What? Have you changed your mind?
Finally, you are mine. (crying with joy)
I clearly said that it is impossible for us to be together. This is just a hormonal impulse.
Could you please let me take this umbrella and face the coming storm with you?
Finally, you are mine. (crying with joy)
It seems that I am too self-righteous.
Let's build our future together.
You are like children building sand castles, and I am the sea beside you. You invite me, and I destroy your castle of happiness.
Do you know the weight of life?
You are not allowed to come in without my permission.
Want to eat osmanthus mooncakes?
How does it taste? (Expecting)
I'll come back next time. It's okay. I can heat it up and eat it later... (disappointed)
Are you free tomorrow? Let’s go out for a walk together?
Thanks.
It seems that I am too self-righteous.
It seems that I should return to the sea. It is the best destination for Chengxiang to return to the sea.
They are all so polite and respectful, but I didn't expect them to be a bunch of beasts in human clothing. (Condemn you)
Do you think I'm a fool who can be summoned and dismissed at will?
Hello, nice to meet you.
Do you need my advice? (Laughs)
I am very interested in your information and I think I would love to get to know you a little better.
Would you mind exchanging numbers?
Tell me about it.
Okay, it's okay.
Thanks.
Don't mess around and you won't get into trouble.
I can't promise
Can you let me through?
I think this is better.
Good, I already hate you.
...Alas, this will not happen again.
I'm sorry to ask you this, and you are free to refuse, but I want to personally thank you for offering this.
Yeah, I understand.
I suggest you don't get close to me, you'll get into trouble.
Thanks.
Hum. (Angry)
Okay, I'll try my best.
Why should I listen to you.
It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter if you know these.
This is my personal privacy.
There is no good end to cheating me. (Puff cheeks)
You are too close to me, get away from me.
Just know that your every move is under my observation.
I see, but these things that have been unearthed are my collection.
I see. But I am not going to agree to return these things easily.
OK, I'll figure it out.
This has nothing to do with you
This has nothing to do with you
Can the ending be happy?
We will get back together.
Fengyi is no longer real and can no longer bring you happiness.
Did you hear Feng's voice?
The two who hear the sound of maple leaves will surely meet again.
Then you must listen carefully next time. (naughty)
Thanks.
Sorry, Fengyi doesn’t need it now. Thank you for your kindness.
It seems you also heard Feng's singing. (shy)
Sorry, Fengyi is not available now, please give me some time.
These are all for you.
It turns out you are a big bad guy.
It seems that we can no longer go on together.
Let’s walk the rest of the way together.
Do you have time to go out together tomorrow?
Okay, see you at the park tomorrow.
Never mind, let’s do it another day.
If you can't eat it, don't eat it. Eating too much is bad for your health.
You are already full, so just throw it away. It is not good to eat too much.
Okay, it’s okay, Fengyi understands.
Guess who I am? You always confuse me with Feng Qian.
Welcome, you are here, would you like some tea?
I think I'm going to like it here.
Can I get into your heart?
Tell me about it.
Enter as you please.
Although I really want to agree, I really can't.
Can you let me through?
So you are this kind of person, I will never talk to you again. (Condemn you)
Let's become passers-by!
Fengyi really wants to give it to you, but you have to fight for it yourself.
...Alas, this will not happen again.
Okay, Fengyi, pay attention next time.
Sorry, but Fengyi doesn’t know where to go?
I'm sorry to ask you this, and you are free to refuse, but I want to personally thank you for offering this.
Yeah, I understand.
Fengyi thinks this is better.
Your army is so close that Fengyi is scared. (crying)
Thank you. (scared)
You know, it doesn't matter.
This is Fengyi's personal privacy.
You're not lying to Fengyi, are you?
So that's how it is, but Fengyi has no way to return the things that have been discovered.
So that's how it is, but Fengyi couldn't easily agree to return these things.
OK, I'll figure it out.
This has nothing to do with you
This has nothing to do with you
Can I still turn back?
We will get back together.
Why, everyone I love leaves me, leaving me alone.
You must have been waiting for a long time. I am here to keep my appointment. What a beautiful rose. Is it for me?
Thank you, I didn’t expect you to be so romantic.
Stop talking, I don't want to listen, your words will tear all my fantasies apart!
Thank you. Thank you. (shy)
No, no, I can't hurt my sister.
It turns out that everything I did was just my wishful thinking.
It's time to let the truth out into the world.
Let's form a club together.
Okay, then it’s a deal, see you then.
You don't have time, okay, let's do it another day... (Lost)
Do you have time tomorrow? Let's go choose props together.
Feeling better now
You don't need it, okay... (lost)
Let me encourage you.
Okay, it's okay.
Thanks.
Sorry, that's all.
Tell me about it.
Guess who I am, you always confuse me with my sister.
Welcome, would you like some tea?
I think I'll like it here.
I think we should all talk about something.
You are so hypocritical that you can't even realize it yourself. (Condemn you)
Go away, I don't want to see you!
Can you let me through?
Don't think about weird things and you won't have any trouble.
I don't agree
You are such a loser, no, go away
...Alas, this will not happen again.
I think this is better.
I'm sorry to ask you this, and you are free to refuse, but I want to personally thank you for offering this.
Yeah, I understand.
Okay, I'll try my best.
Why should I listen to you.
You are too close, please leave!
Thank you.
Hum. (Angry)
These insignificant
This is my personal privacy.
I'm warning you not to do anything weird, just leave quickly.
I hope so.
I see, but these things that have been unearthed are mine.
I see. But I am not going to agree to return these things easily.
OK, I'll figure it out.
This has nothing to do with you
This has nothing to do with you
Can I still turn back?
We will get back together.
